settings.content: Configure when to show low stock and critical stock warnings

settings.label: Low Stock Threshold
settings.info: Show low stock warning when inventory falls below this number

settings.label: Critical Stock Threshold
settings.info: Show critical stock warning when inventory falls below this number

settings.label: Show Exact Stock Count
settings.info: Display exact number of items in stock (e.g., '5 left') instead of generic messages

settings.label: Enable Real-Time Stock Updates
settings.info: Poll backend API for real-time inventory updates every 30 seconds

settings.label: Show Availability Badge
settings.info: Display stock availability badge on product pages

settings.label: Show Urgency Banner
settings.info: Display urgency messages to encourage purchases

settings.label: Show Countdown Timer
settings.info: Display countdown timer for critical stock items

settings.label: Countdown Duration (minutes)
settings.info: How long the countdown timer should run

settings.label: Enable Social Proof Messages
settings.info: Show messages like 'X people viewing this item'

settings.label: Enable Bundle Recommendations
settings.info: Show 'Frequently Bought Together' product bundles

settings.label: Maximum Bundle Products
settings.info: Maximum number of products to show in bundle recommendations

settings.label: Bundle Discount %
settings.info: Discount percentage when buying bundle together

settings.label: Bundle API Endpoint
settings.info: Backend API endpoint for fetching bundle recommendations

settings.label: Auto-Display Bundles
settings.info: Automatically show bundle recommendations on product pages

settings.label: Display Delay (seconds)
settings.info: Delay before showing bundle recommendations (0 = immediate)

settings.content: Configure connection to Twisted Monk Suite backend API

settings.label: API Base URL
settings.info: Base URL for the Twisted Monk Suite API

settings.label: API Key
settings.info: API key for authentication (keep this secret!)

settings.label: Cache Timeout (seconds)
settings.info: How long to cache API responses

settings.label: Enable Fallback Mode
settings.info: Use fallback data if API is unavailable

settings.label: Enable 'Notify When Available'
settings.info: Allow customers to sign up for back-in-stock notifications

settings.label: Notification Email Address
settings.info: Email address to receive notification signups

settings.label: Enable Analytics Tracking
settings.info: Track events like impressions, clicks, and conversions

settings.label: Enable Lazy Loading
settings.info: Load bundle recommendations only when needed

settings.label: Respect Reduced Motion Preferences
settings.info: Disable animations for users who prefer reduced motion
